description: Now with Dot Defense mode! --- How fast can you hit the dots? You have 30 seconds to tap as many of them as you can. Beat the (online) highscores in single player mode or compete with up to three other players, trying to tap more dots of your color than the other players do. As all players share the same screen, this is guaranteed to be great fun! --- Update 1.1 introduces the Clean Screen Mode in which you have to clean the screen from all dots as fast as possible. Update 1.1.1 adds the fireworks option. Update 1.2 introduces online highscores! With version 1.3, the game can be played on the Pixi (with separate online highscores). Update 1.4 introduces Dot Defense mode: tap the dots before they reach the bottom of the screen!
